sentences.en: Behind the crude lectern, off to a side, stands a curtained puppet theatre.
sentences.cn: 在粗糙的读经台后面, 偏向一边, 是一座挂着幕布的木偶戏台.

sentences.en: He jerked the string and the puppet jumped.
sentences.cn: 他猛一拉绳子,木偶就跳了起来.

sentences.en: He's my puppet and I'm his puppet master.
sentences.cn: 他是我的小狗,我是小狗的主人.

sentences.en: I will call this new puppet Pinocchio, he thought.
sentences.cn: 他心想:“我把这个新的木偶叫做皮诺奇好了. ”

sentences.en: Jossie: Is everyone ready to practise the puppet show?
sentences.cn: 琼西: 大家都准备好木偶剧没?

sentences.en: On this high note the puppet show commences.
sentences.cn: 木偶戏就在这阵高昂的调子里开场了.

sentences.en: Pupils presented a mime and puppet show.
sentences.cn: 学生们奉献了一台哑剧形式的木偶戏。

sentences.en: The audience at the back craned their necks to see the puppet show.
sentences.cn: 后面的观众伸长了脖子看木偶戏.

sentences.en: The doctor is a very dogmatic puppet.
sentences.cn: 这个医生是个真正的道学先生.

sentences.en: The government is in danger of becoming a mere puppet of the military.
sentences.cn: 政府面临沦为军方傀儡的危险。

sentences.en: The morale of the puppet troops dropped to a new low.
sentences.cn: 伪军的士气进一步低落了.

sentences.en: The puppet - show was performed with great regularity and decency.
sentences.cn: 木偶戏的演出井然有序,也很规矩.

sentences.en: The puppet soldier cried for mercy.
The puppet troops burnt the whole village down.
The whole village was burnt down by the puppet troops.
sentences.cn: 整个村子都被伪军焚毁了.

sentences.en: We watched a performance which included a puppet show and acrobatics.
sentences.cn: 我们观看了一场演出,内容有木偶和杂技.

sentences.en: When the invasion occurred he seized power and ruled the country as a puppet of the occupiers.
sentences.cn: 他趁入侵之时夺取了政权，作为占领者的傀儡统治着这个国家。

words.tran_cn: 操纵木偶的人；操纵傀儡

trans.tran_cn: 木偶，傀儡，受他人操纵的人
trans.tran_en: a model of a person or animal that you move by pulling wires or strings, or by putting your hand inside it
